title: The Writer's Almanac - Thursday, March 12, 2020
description: On this day 11 years ago, Bernard Madoff pleaded guilty to 11 felony counts in the largest embezzlement and fraud case in Wall Street history.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: On this day 11 years ago, Bernard Madoff pleaded guilty to 11 felony counts in the largest embezzlement and fraud case in Wall Street history.
